DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To examine effect dietary exercise intervention body weight body composition overweight obese woman undergone breast cancer treatment . - To examine effect dietary exercise intervention index psychological health status biomarkers associate disease recurrence overweight obese woman undergone breast cancer treatment . Secondary - To examine relationship change body weight biomarkers associated disease recurrence physiological health status , include circulating level estrogen , C-reactive protein , interleukin-6 . - To examine relationship change psychological health status , circulate stress hormone , index immune function . - To examine effect dietary exercise intervention broad quality-of-life dimension . OUTLINE : Patients randomize one intervention arm . - Arm I ( lifestyle intervention ) : Patients undergo moderate-intensity aerobic-exercise session 3 5 day week 24 week . Patients able attend five supervised session counsel fit extra 1-2 home/community-based exercise session weekly routine . All session physical activity record physical activity log . Portable pedometer use determine number steps/distance walk day . Patients wear heart-rate monitor throughout exercise session . Heart rate rating perceive exertion assess regular interval . The exercise-therapy session use variety cognitive-behavioral technique promote exercise adherence well positive attitude experience . Patients also give individualized healthy-eating dietary advice write information packet name ' Weight Loss On A Plate ' . Patients also counsel reduce dietary fat intake 25 % total caloric intake , eat least 5 portion fruit vegetable daily , increase fiber intake , reduce carbohydrate , take moderate amount alcohol . Patients also counsel reduce total daily calorie intake 600 kcal calculate energy requirement . Individual energy requirement estimate formula basal metabolic rate physical activity level . Patients complete 3-day diet diary prior begin study treatment weekly throughout study . The diary pre-intervention week 6 , 12 , 18 , 24 analyze , look specifically macronutrients . Patients meet research assistant weekly discus individual diet diary identify way improve nutritional intake . - Arm II ( normal care ) : Patients provide general healthy-eating booklet entitle , `` Getting Balance Right '' . Depression , psychological stress , quality life assess baseline 12 week , 25 week . Blood sample examine various biomarkers include interleukin-6 ELISA , estradiol radioimmunoassay , lymphocyte phenotyping NK-cell activity flow cytometry . Salivary cortisol level measure 4 time two consecutive day high-sensitivity salivary cortisol enzyme immunoassay .
